General.Name: Zhejiang Century Huatong Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Century Huatong Group Co.,Ltd engages in the auto parts, Internet games, and cloud data business in China and internationally. The company's Auto Part Manufacturing division engages in the research, development, production, and sale of automotive plastic parts and metal stamping parts. Its Internet Game division focuses on the research and development, operation, licensing, and investment in the entertainment industry. The company's Clout Data division provides Internet data center services, equipment leasing, and other solutions. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
